thread.title: Parrikar says will be CM if party asks
thread.title_full: Parrikar says will be CM if party asks

author: Prakash Kamat
title: Parrikar says will be CM if party asks
text:
March 12, 2017 19:06 IST Updated: March 12, 2017 19:06 IST more-in 
Defence Minister Manohar Parrikar said on Sunday that he would become Chief Minister of Goa if the party asks him to do so. 
“I will do whatever party wants me to do,” he said. 
Mr. Parrikar, huddled with other BJP leaders led by Union Minister Nitin Gadkari at a five star resort on the outskirts of Panaji, confirmed to The Hindu that the party was definitely getting support for government formation in Goa. 
Although Mr. Parrikar did not confirm if BJP has got support letters of MGP and two Independents as stated by party spokesperson, but said, the information “will be told to you (media) by Mr. Gadkari.”
